Package pl.polsl.kubala.patryk.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.kubala.patryk.model.Model
public class Model extends Object
Class containing all variables and methods responsible for checking and actually encoding / decoding the text
Version:
1.1
Author:
Patryk Kubala

    Class

    static enum 
    Model.EnumChoice
    An enumerated type designed to better show the user's decision whether to encode or decode

    • takeFromCommandLine

      public void takeFromCommandLine(String[] commandLineArgs) throws IncorrectInputException
      Function that checks command line arguments and saves them into appropiate variables
      Parameters:
      commandLineArgs - command line argument passed from main through Controller
      Throws:
      IncorrectInputException - if not all of the required fields are filled using command line

    • setKey

      public void setKey()
      Function that takes the seed (from the private field in the Model) and uses it, as the name suggests, as the seed for the semi-random generation of the key. It then checks if any of the values repeats and if they do, it changes them

    • decodeText

      public String decodeText() throws IncorrectTextException
      Function that takes encodeed text (from the private field in Model), decodes it and returns it decodeed
      Returns:
      Decodeed text
      Throws:
      IncorrectTextException - if the text formatting is incorect for decodeion

    • encodeText

      public String encodeText() throws IncorrectTextException
      Function that takes text (from the private field in Model), encodes it and returns it encodeed
      Returns:
      Encrypted text
      Throws:
      IncorrectTextException - if the text contains forbidden symbols, for example letters outside of english alphabet

    • destroyKey

      public void destroyKey()
      Clear key.
